alert.note: Alert for Clark (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 05 at 11:22AM CDT until August 05 at 11:47PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri... Fox River at Wayland affecting Clark County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Fox River at Wayland. * WHEN...Until late this evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 17.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 17.7 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late this afternoon. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/quadcities. The next statement will be issued this evening.
